mapper.insert: insert into CHANGERECORDINFO ( REFSERIALNO, TABLENAME, CUSTNO, APKIND, RECORDBEFORE, RECORDAFTER ) values ( #{refserialno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tablename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{apkind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordbefore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordafter,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into fdacfinalresult ( SERIALNO, CUSTNO, APKIND, WORKDATE, APDT,
APTM, STATUS, FROM_BANKSERIALID, FROM_ACCOID, FROM_TRADEACCO,
FROM_FUNDCODE, FROM_FUNDCORPNO, FROM_CHARGETYPE, TO_BANKSERIALID, TO_ACCOID,
TO_TRADEACCO, TO_FUNDCODE, TO_FUNDCORPNO, TO_CHARGETYPE, APPAMT,
APPVOL, ACKAMT, ACKVOL, AUTOID, ORSERIALNO
) values ( #{serialno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{apkind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{apdt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{aptm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frombankserialid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fromaccoid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fromtradeacco,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fromfundcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fromfundcorpno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fromchargetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tobankserialid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toaccoid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{totradeacco,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tofundcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tofundcorpno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tochargetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appamt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{appvol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ackamt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ackvol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{autoid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orserialno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
